project.title: Authorship Guidelines - Sample
project.description: Overview of guidelines for publication and presentation of data and information from clinical trials. The information includes assumptions, expectations, responsibilities and requirements for publication, as well as criteria used for determining authorship, co-authorship and acknowledgments.
project.keywords: author, publish, publication, first author, senior author, journal, presentation, abstract, authoring, poster, acknowledgement, writing, writer, editor, edit
